text: Nikki Glaser (; born June 1, 1984) is an American stand-up comedian, actress, and television host. She hosted the television series Not Safe with Nikki Glaser. She hosted the reality TV dating shows Blind Date (2019) and FBoy Island (2021â€“). She also hosted the 2025 Golden Globe Awards, which made her the first solo female host in Golden Globes history. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Television personalities from Ohio Category:Comedians from Ohio Category:Actors from Cincinnati Category:Podcasters
title: Nikki Glaser
